results.name: The 2-adic valuation of A318649, the numerators of "Dirichlet Square Root" of squares.
comment: Probably also the 2-adic valuation of A318511.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: (PARI) A318655(n) = valuation(A318649(n),2); \\ Needs also code from A318649.
xref: Cf. A318511, A318649, A318651, A318652, A318654 (the positions of nonzero terms).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 01 2018
